AD_Blackboard.synopsis: Comment on the blackboard in Haven
AD_Blackboard.how_to_trigger: 1. Click on the black board on the second floor of the haven tavern.

PAD_SeluneShrine.synopsis: Comment on the Selunite shrine at 35; 0; -694 in Haven.
PAD_SeluneShrine.how_to_trigger: 1. Approach the Selunite shrine in Haven at 35; 0; -694

PAD_MeenlockReaction.synopsis: This fight occurs in the basement of the last light inn. Meenlocks are clawed fey creatures. If the player passes a check they identify them and their most dangerous aspect, otherwise they simply reccognise  what the meenlocks are and realise they are sensitive to light (light spell or torch for instance). If they fail, they can make note of their sharp claws (for instance.)
PAD_MeenlockReaction.how_to_trigger: Begin the fight the meenlocks beneath last light (can also be accessed from the 'honeymoon lodge')

automatic_ordering.reasoning: We have three sessions: AD_Blackboard, PAD_SeluneShrine, and PAD_MeenlockReaction. The information provided only describes unique interactions in different locations (Haven and the Last Light Inn area) without any reference to one session causing or being a consequence of another. Additionally, there are no clues indicating that the sessions conflict with each other or that choosing one would exclude the possibility of triggering another. Therefore, there is no ordering dependency or mutual exclusiveness among these sessions.

PAD_SeluneShrine_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneShrine_0.context: NodeContext: Arc - SH is loyal to shar

PAD_SeluneShrine_3.speaker: Player
PAD_SeluneShrine_3.text: Perhaps they had no choice but to hide.

PAD_SeluneShrine_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SeluneShrine_1.text: A shrine to Selûne. I might have sneered at this, once. Or tried to destroy it.
PAD_SeluneShrine_1.context: NodeContext: Arc - SH has turned from Shar

PAD_SeluneShrine_2.speaker: Player
PAD_SeluneShrine_2.text: I believe that's called growth, Shadowheart.

PAD_MeenlockReaction_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MeenlockReaction_0.text: Meenlocks! Their eyes are sensitive - light or fire is my friend.
PAD_MeenlockReaction_0.context: NodeContext: a monster has appeared before you

PAD_MeenlockReaction_1.speaker: Player
PAD_MeenlockReaction_1.context: NodeContext: a monster has appeared before you - [prn. Mean-lock]

PAD_MeenlockReaction_3.speaker: Player
PAD_MeenlockReaction_3.text: Their eyes are made for the dark - fire and light is our friend.
PAD_MeenlockReaction_3.context: NodeContext: a monster has appeared before you, trying to warn your fellow player

PAD_MeenlockReaction_4.speaker: Player
PAD_MeenlockReaction_4.text: Those claws look deadly. Best be on my guard.
